title: ToToM - Bootleg is Resistance Vol. II/III (around NIN) [FLAC]
description:
ToToM
Bootleg is Resistance, volume II
2008

This album is the second volume out of the Bootleg is Resistance trilogy, a triple mashup album made around songs by Nine Inch Nails from the album Year Zero, which are mixed up with completely stranger songs. This second volume features mashups (or bootlegs, whatever you call them) where you can hear more or less popular artists sing/rap over Year Zero songs.

I post it exclusively on Waffles, a few hours before the "official" release.
